resources.string: The SDK allows an application to request a list of offers that can then be displayed or utilized in any way desirable. Press the button below to request a list of offers. Tap on an offer title to display the offer.

Banner Views can be added to any layout. Once the banner is inflated, the SDK will make a request to the server to get offers. If the user has already been asked the required information they will be presented with the offer (or offer chooser in the case of multiple offers). The SDK will load the appropriate asset to fill the space alloted to it within the layout.

Button Views can be added to any layout. Once the button is inflated, the SDK will make a request to the server to get offers. If the user has already been asked the required information they will be presented with the offer (or offer chooser in the case of multiple offers). The SDK will load the appropriate asset based on screen density. Included above are a small and a large button.

Banner Views can be dynamically added to any layout. Once the banner is inflated, the SDK will make a request to the server to get offers. If the user has already been asked the required information they will be presented with the offer (or offer chooser in the case of multiple offers). The SDK will load the appropriate asset to fill the space alloted to it within the layout. Press the button below to add dynamic banners to the layout.

Button Views can be dynamically added to any layout. Once the button is inflated, the SDK will make a request to the server to get offers. If the user has already been asked the required information they will be presented with the offer (or offer chooser in the case of multiple offers). The SDK will load the appropriate asset based on screen density. Press the buttons below to add dynamic buttons to the layout.

Splashscreens are full screen overlays that can be displayed over your content. Once loaded, the SDK will make a request to the server to get offers. If the user has already been asked the required information they will be presented with the offer (or the offer chooser in the case of multiple offers). The SDK will load the appropriate asset based on screen size and density. Tap the button below to show an offer splashscreen.
